env_configs.name: DATABASE_URL
env_configs.description: Database connection string for blog posts and portfolio items.

env_configs.name: STORAGE_BUCKET_URL
env_configs.description: URL for image and asset storage (e.g., AWS S3, Cloudinary).

env_configs.name: CONTACT_FORM_EMAIL_RECIPIENT
env_configs.description: Email address to receive submissions from the contact form.

env_configs.name: ADMIN_USERNAME
env_configs.description: Username for accessing the blog administration panel.

env_configs.name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
env_configs.description: Password for accessing the blog administration panel.

env_configs.name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID
env_configs.description: Google Analytics tracking ID for website analytics (optional).

suggested_features.name: Responsive Design
suggested_features.description: Ensure optimal viewing experience across various devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).

suggested_features.name: SEO Optimization
suggested_features.description: Implement best practices for search engine optimization (meta tags, sitemap, semantic HTML).

suggested_features.name: Content Management System (CMS) for Blog
suggested_features.description: An admin interface to create, edit, delete blog posts, categories, and tags.

suggested_features.name: Contact Form
suggested_features.description: A functional form for visitors to send messages directly.

suggested_features.name: Image and Asset Optimization
suggested_features.description: Automatic compression and responsive serving of images for faster load times.

suggested_features.name: Social Media Integration
suggested_features.description: Links to social profiles and share buttons for blog posts.

suggested_features.name: Comments Section
suggested_features.description: Enable visitors to comment on blog posts (e.g., Disqus, custom solution).

pages.name: Home Page
pages.description: Introduction to the portfolio owner, a brief overview of skills and featured work/blog posts.

pages.name: About Page
pages.description: Detailed personal and professional background, skills, experience, and maybe a CV/resume link.

pages.name: Portfolio Page
pages.description: Displays a gallery or list of projects with links to detailed views.

pages.name: Portfolio Project Detail Page
pages.description: Dedicated page for each portfolio project, including description, technologies, images, and live demo/repo links.

pages.name: Blog Page
pages.description: Lists all blog posts, potentially with pagination, categories, and tags.

pages.name: Blog Post Detail Page
pages.description: Displays the full content of a single blog post.

pages.name: Contact Page
pages.description: Provides a contact form and other ways to get in touch.

pages.name: Admin Login Page
pages.description: Page for administrators to log in.

pages.name: Admin Dashboard
pages.description: Overview for administrators, links to manage content.

pages.name: Admin Post Management Page
pages.description: CRUD interface for managing blog posts.

pages.name: Admin Post Editor Page
pages.description: Page to create or edit a blog post.
